title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 4-6.3 - Clearance for boilers installed before march 31, 1965
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 4-6.3 - Clearance for boilers installed before march 31, 1965

State Regulations

Where necessary for proper operation, maintenance and
inspection, clearance shall be provided from building walls, partitions, ceilings or other structures. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
4-6.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
